# currency

**Instance Property**

The ISO-4217 currency code for the country or region of the merchant’s principle place of business.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency var currency: Locale.Currency { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use the [https://www.iso.org/iso-4217-currency-codes.html] currency code that represents the location of the merchant’s principal place of business.

## Accessing information about the transaction

- **amount**: The decimal value that represents the amount of the customer’s shopping cart or item pricing.
